summary: An ordinance amending Section 1 or Ordinance No. 45382, said Ordinance being entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises and the height and size of buildings for yards, courts, or other open spaces; establishing districts for said purposes; defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28, 1923, and adding thereto one new section, to be known as Section 17 (PP).
